Title: S6 Ep. 239 John Crossman - Future of DEI
Description:
John Crossman is one of those people you meet that is a person that makes change that ripples in your community. He is passionate about #DiversityAndInclusion and #DiverseWorkplace. He brings awareness to others about #HBCU and raising the bar. This episode is a must listen if you want to learn more about supporting Historic Black Colleges and Universities.  We also hope you will tune into the 2022 Intern Whisperer Podcast, S5 Ep. 194 which was voted 2nd Fan Favorite on our Employers 4 Change YouTube Channel

The Intern Whisperer Podcast is brought to you by Employers 4 Change - Increasing diversity through #DEI #Skills-based #recruitment and #management for #interns and #employees alike. Sign up to be an #Employer4Change that invests in #intern #talent and your #employees.

Want a break? Play Intern Pursuit Game on Steam.  Thank you to our sponsor Cat 5 Studios.
